November 5, 2020 Why are your competitors succeeding? Free Virtual Webinar If there’s one thing these unprecedented times are underscoring for restaurants, it’s that their survival hinges on quickly adapting to meet their customers’ needs. Consumers are highly concerned about safety and hygiene, so whether it’s modifying the store layout for social distancing, improving curbside delivery, or implementing contactless order and pay, restaurants around the world are employing creative strategies to remove friction from the guest experience and many are finding success in doing so.
To learn more about some of the best practices your peers in the hospitality industry have implemented, join NCR for a complimentary virtual webinar, “Reshaping the Guest Experience,” on Tuesday, November 10, 2020 at 1:00 p.m. ET. You will hear about easy-to-implement strategies that will help your restaurant emerge successfully from the pandemic and beyond.
Time is running out to reserve your spot, so register today! <[[https://on.lenos.com/ncr/reshapingtheguestexperience-virtualwebinar/Content/Overview]]>
Featured Speaker: Jessica Bryant, Executive Director Marketing, NCR Hospitality Orchestrate off-premise orders seamlessly Even before the pandemic, off premise orders were on the uptick with consumers preferring the convenience, ease, and flexibility of ordering whatever they crave, to enjoy wherever they want. Now, the pandemic has elevated take-out, curbside, and delivery orders to a whole new level. In this article, we explore four of the main challenges that restaurants face with the increase in demand for off-premise ordering and how, with the right technology they can meet them, and serve delicious, fresh food to every customer, every time, no matter where they chooses to enjoy it. Read more <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/4-ways-to-overcome-kitchen-chaos-and-orchestrate-off-premise-orders-seamlessly]]> More Aloha Essentials Resources!
